actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to require that estimates of the average cost for each taxpaying family be included in all bills and resolutions of a public character introduced and reported in the Senate and the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Truth in Spending Act - Amends the Congressional Budget Act to require that all public bills and resolutions introduced in Congress or reported by a committee contain an estimate of the average cost of such measure to each taxpaying family.

titles.title: A bill to require that estimates of the average cost for each taxpaying family be included in all bills and resolutions of a public character introduced and reported in the Senate and the House of Representatives.
